fields.headline: OK commuter
fields.bodyText: In reality, the sound of the underground is the noise of a fat man in a suit sweating - but when it comes to trashy pop there's no need to be that picky. I've Commited Murder is on here because my Monday to-do list looks like this: kill boss, steal money, run away with someone hot to a desert island. No, I don't often get through it. I listen to the Pink Martini track while walking along, so people don't stare as I sing "la, la, la, la, la, Lilly stay" repeatedly and sway to the Latin beat. St Swithin's Day is for when you've been at the office late on a Friday night, and everyone else on the tube has spent the night in the pub. And Mr Brightside? Sometimes you just have to let your inner misanthrope get a kick out of someone else's misery. 1 Girls Aloud Sound of the Underground 2 Macy Gray I've Committed Murder 3 Pink Martini Lilly 4 The Killers Mr Brightside 5 St Swithin's Day Dubstar
